ingredients.item: 200g pack Waitrose Tenderstem & Butternut Stir Fry
Â½ x 680g jar essential Waitrose Passata

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the stir-fry mix for 2-3 minutes. Add the curry paste and then the passata and cook for a further 2 minutes.
Stir in the prawns and cook for 2 minutes until they turn pink and are cooked throughout.
Off the heat, stir in half the yogurt. Serve with the naans and remaining yogurt.
